text: Hector Dion (1881–1943) was an American film actor of the silent era.Low p.300 ==Selected filmography== * Just Like a Woman (1912) * The Wrong Bottle (1913) * The Crook and the Girl (1913) * A Tender-Hearted Crook (1913) * The Stopped Clock (1913) * The Shepherd Lassie of Argyle (1914) * The $5,000,000 Counterfeiting Plot (1914) * Shopgirls (1914) * The Return of Draw Egan (1916) * Silas Marner (1916) * King Lear (1916) * Fighting Mad (1917) * One More American (1918) * Painted Lips (1918) * Judge Her Not (1921) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. The History of the British Film 1914-1918. Routledge, 2005. ==External links== * Category:1881 births Category:1943 deaths Category:American male film actors Category:People from Boston
title: Hector Dion
